named-query.name: READ_SKUS_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT sku FROM org.broadleafcommerce.catalog.domain.SkuImpl sku WHERE sku.id IN (:skuIds)

named-query.name: READ_SKUS_BY_CATEGORY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT sku FROM org.broadleafcommerce.catalog.domain.SkuImpl sku WHERE sku.product.id = :productId
